entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The location where Harry has been invited to spend the remainder of his school holidays. ("Burrow, where you have been invited to spend the remainder of your school holidays.")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore, who is inviting Harry to the Burrow and asking for his assistance in a matter. ("I am, yours most sincerely, Albus Dumbledore")

relationships.description: Dumbledore invites Harry to the Burrow. ("Burrow, where you have been invited to spend the remainder of your school holidays.")
